body:
Thank you all.   Paying closer attention to the -dt and -dc parameters  
makes a lot of sense.  Sure enough, setting -dt 0 and -dc 1 improves  
the results and  fixes the artifact problem.


Regards,
Chris
Christian Humann ~ Associate
LOISOS + UBBELOHDE
